feed.title: Hosted Private Cloud Status - Incident History

entry.title: [RBX8][Hosted Private Cloud] - Network equipement operation
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Dec 21, 05:00 - 14:00 UTC

Nov 23, 22:38 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 21/12/2023 05:00 UTC
End time : 21/12/2023 14:00 UTC
Service impact : Impacted services might experience some input/output freezes for storage equipment during the maintenance.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy of our network infrastructure, we will be doing an internal maintenance on a network equipment.

entry.title: [ERI][VMware Private Cloud] - Storage cluster5020
entry.content:
Dec 6, 09:49 UTC
Resolved - Start time : 06/12/2023 07:06 UTC
End time : 06/12/2023 07:45 UTC
Service impacted : Datastores on cluster5020 was temporarily unavailable
Technical impact (DC/geographical area) : ERI1c
Root cause : Incident link
Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational.
